> Sunhawk:  I read the full report about the Beast Wars and after we've
> located the Predicons I'd suggest coping a tactic they once used.  We
> steal the energon shelding device they'll inevitably have to use and
> force them to stay in Beast Mode constantly.  Then while they sleep
> the Beast Modes will take over leaving them helpless and at our
> mercy.  We can then use parts from there ship to repair our own and
> get the Pit out of here.
>

{Talos}
Deck 2, CR Chamber

Talos considered Sunhawks words motioning him to relax. "First we have to
find the stolen ship and deal with the predicons, as is we need some recon.
Since the sensors are up at least for a certain range we should be able to
spot any forces en route if they're within weapons fire range. Do some recon
outside, recruit another bot or two if you need, try and find a good
location for construction of a sensor enhancement tower, the longer sight
and comm range we have the more secure our position will be."

    Turning he adjusted the comm for a ship wide broadcast and finding
repairs already showing a noticeable improvement in the operations,
"Excellent work people, we have some scanning ability, comms should be
repaired fully soon and then we can get back to our primary mission. When
finished with your current activities report to the mess hall, I'm sure you
could all use some energon and rest. That is all..."

    Looking back at Sunhawk, "And you have your new orders lieutenant, a
prime spot for the signal enhancer is extremely important. Hop to."
